SEARCH
Module FillTheFormAPI.main
Package pl.edu.pwr.pkuchnowski.filltheformapi.controller

Class RedirectController

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.pwr.pkuchnowski.filltheformapi.controller.RedirectController
@RestController public class RedirectController extends Object
Redirect controller to handle redirects to the Javadoc and Swagger UI.

This class implements a controller that redirects the user to the Javadoc when the user accesses the `/javadoc` endpoint and to the Swagger UI when the user accesses the `/swagger-ui` endpoint. It sends a redirect response to the client to redirect the user to the appropriate page. The controller is annotated with `@RestController` which automatically add the `@ResponseBody` annotation to all the handler methods.

Author:
Piotr Kuchnowski

  • Method Details

    • handleJavadoc

      @GetMapping("/javadoc") void handleJavadoc(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Redirects the user to the Javadoc.

      This method is invoked when the user accesses the `/javadoc` endpoint. It redirects the user to the Javadoc by sending a redirect response to the client.

      Parameters:
      response - the HttpServletResponse to send the redirect response to.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while sending the redirect response.

    • handleJavadocSlash

      @GetMapping("/javadoc/") void handleJavadocSlash(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Redirects the user to the Javadoc.

      Parameters:
